com.fasterxml.clustermate.service.store

Class StoredEntryConverter<K extends com.fasterxml.storemate.shared.EntryKey,E extends StoredEntry<K>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fasterxml.clustermate.service.store.StoredEntryConverter<K,E>

  • public abstract class StoredEntryConverter<K extends com.fasterxml.storemate.shared.EntryKey,E extends StoredEntry<K>>
extends Object
    Converter used by store for handling conversions between low-level Storable (things stored in StoreMate store), and ClusterMate-level StoredEntry instances.

    Custom sub-classing is needed to support additional metadata for systems implementations.
